title: Fireplace*, Movie Theater, Spacious Floor Plans
posting_body: ['Gloria Park Villas', '3625 S. Decatur Blvd., Las Vegas, NV, 89103', 'Call Now -', 'show contact info', 'x 47', 'OR Text', '47', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to contact us.', 'Interested in more information?', 'See link below:', '<URL>', 'GLORIA PARK VILLAS APARTMENTS IN LAS VEGAS', 'This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 750 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'We offer 1, 2 and 3 bedroom apartment homes for rent in a small gated community.', 'We have garages and storage lockers for rent and we are pet friendly.', 'We have 2 swimming pools, spa, fitness center and gas barbecues throughout the community.', 'All apartments come with washer, dryer, refrigerator/freezer, oven/stove, microwave, ceiling fan, central heating/AC, everything is electric.', 'Resident will be responsible for all utilities in addition to the rent.', 'We charge for water, trash, sewer, real estate tax and CAM Fee and bill monthly through UB West.', "We do require renter's insurance with $100,000.00 liability coverage.", 'Pet Policy', 'Cats & Dogs only, maximum 2 pets per apartment.', 'Dog 35 lb.', 'weight limit fully grown.', 'Breed restrictions apply, non-aggressive breeds only.', '$300.00 Non-refundable pet fee plus $35.00 monthly pet rent for 1 pet.', '$400.00 Non-refundable pet fee plus $50.00 monthly pet rent 2 pets.', 'Income Requirements:', '3 times the amount of rent, total household gross income.', 'Driving Directions:', 'We are located between Spring Mountain Road and Twain Ave., on S. Decatur Blvd.', 'Office Hours:', 'Monday-Friday:9:00AM-6:00PM', 'Saturday-Sunday:10:00AM-5:00PM', 'Prices are subject to change, based on availability and qualification of the applicant, additional fees may apply.', 'gr8rW08k']
